00041 // Force std::vector to release allocated memory
00042 template <typename T>
00043 static inline void free_vector( std::vector<T>& v )
00044 {
00045   std::vector<T> temp;
00046   temp.swap( v );
00047 }
00048 
00049 std::string QuasiNewton::get_name() const { return "QuasiNewton"; }

00051 PatchSet* QuasiNewton::get_patch_set()
00052   { return PatchSetUser::get_patch_set(); }

00054 QuasiNewton::QuasiNewton( ObjectiveFunction* of )
00055   : VertexMover( of ), PatchSetUser(true), mMemento(0)
00056 { }

00058 QuasiNewton::~QuasiNewton()
00059 {
00060   delete mMemento;
00061   mMemento = 0;
00062 }

00065 void QuasiNewton::initialize( PatchData& pd, MsqError& err )
00066 {
00067   if (!mMemento) {
00068     mMemento = pd.create_vertices_memento( err );
00069     MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00070   }
00071 }

00074 { }

00078 
00079 void QuasiNewton::cleanup()
00080 { 
00081     // release memento
00082   delete mMemento;
00083   mMemento = 0;
00084 
00085     // release coordinates
00086   for (size_t i = 0; i < (sizeof(w)/sizeof(w[0])); ++i)   
00087     free_vector(w[i]);
00088     // release gradients
00089   for (size_t i = 0; i < (sizeof(v)/sizeof(v[0])); ++i) 
00090     free_vector(v[i]);
00091   
00092     // release Hessian memory
00093   free_vector(mHess);
00094   
00095     // release temporary array memory
00096   free_vector(x);
00097   free_vector(d);
00098 }
00099 
00100 // Do v += s * x, where v and x are arrays of length n
00101 static inline void plus_eq_scaled( Vector3D* v, double s, const Vector3D* x, size_t n )
00102 {
00103   Vector3D* end = v + n;
00104   for (; v != end; ++v, ++x)
00105     *v += s * *x;
00106 }
00107 
00108 void QuasiNewton::solve( Vector3D* z_arr, const Vector3D* v_arr ) const
00109 {
00110   SymMatrix3D pd;
00111   
00112   const double small = DBL_EPSILON;
00113   const size_t nn = mHess.size();
00114   for (size_t i = 0; i < nn; ++i) {
00115 
00116       // ensure positive definite: perturb a bit if
00117       // diagonal values are zero.
00118     SymMatrix3D d = mHess[i];
00119     while (fabs(d[0]) < small || fabs(d[3]) < small || fabs(d[5]) < small)
00120       d += small;
00121 
00122       // factor
00123     pd[0] = 1.0 / d[0];
00124     pd[1] = d[1] * pd[0];
00125     pd[2] = d[2] * pd[0];
00126     
00127     pd[3] = 1.0 / (d[3] - d[1]*pd[1]);
00128     pd[5] = d[4] - d[2]*pd[1];
00129     pd[4] = pd[3] * pd[5];
00130     pd[5] = 1.0 / (d[5] - d[2]*pd[2] - pd[4]*pd[5]);
00131     
00132     if (pd[0] <= 0.0 || pd[3] <= 0.0 || pd[5] <= 0.0) {
00133       if (d[0] + d[3] + d[5] <= 0) {
00134           // switch to diagonal
00135         pd[0] = 1.0 / fabs(d[0]);
00136         pd[1] = 0.0;
00137         pd[2] = 0.0;
00138         pd[3] = 1.0 / fabs(d[3]);
00139         pd[4] = 0.0;
00140         pd[5] = 1.0 / fabs(d[5]);
00141       }
00142       else {
00143           // diagonal preconditioner
00144         pd[0] = pd[3] = pd[5] = 1.0 / (d[0] + d[3] + d[5]);
00145         pd[1] = pd[2] = pd[4] = 0.0;
00146       }
00147     }
00148 
00149       // solve
00150     const Vector3D& v = v_arr[i];
00151     Vector3D& z = z_arr[i];
00152     z[0] = v[0];
00153     z[1] = v[1] - pd[1]*z[0];
00154     z[2] = v[2] - pd[2]*z[0] - pd[4]*z[1];
00155 
00156     z[0] *= pd[0];
00157     z[1] *= pd[3];
00158     z[2] *= pd[5];
00159 
00160     z[1] -= pd[4]*z[2];
00161     z[0] -= pd[1]*z[1] + pd[2]*z[2];
00162   }
00163 }
00164     
00165 
00166 void QuasiNewton::optimize_vertex_positions( PatchData& pd, MsqError& err )
00167 {
00168   TerminationCriterion& term = *get_inner_termination_criterion();
00169   OFEvaluator& func = get_objective_function_evaluator();
00170   
00171   const double sigma = 1e-4;
00172   const double beta0 = 0.25;
00173   const double beta1 = 0.80;
00174   const double tol1 = 1e-8;
00175   const double epsilon = 1e-10;
00176 
00177   double norm_r; //, norm_g;
00178   double alpha, beta;
00179   double obj, objn;
00180 
00181   size_t i;
00182   
00183     // Initialize stuff
00184   const size_t nn = pd.num_free_vertices();
00185   double a[QNVEC], b[QNVEC], r[QNVEC];
00186   for (i = 0; i < QNVEC; ++i)
00187     r[i] = 0;
00188   for (i = 0; i <= QNVEC; ++i) {
00189     v[i].clear();
00190     v[i].resize( nn, Vector3D(0.0) );
00191     w[i].clear();
00192     w[i].resize( nn, Vector3D(0.0) );
00193   }
00194   d.resize( nn );
00195   mHess.resize( nn );  //hMesh(mesh);
00196 
00197   bool valid = func.update( pd, obj, v[QNVEC], mHess, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00198   if (!valid) {
00199     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Initial objective function is not valid", MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00200     return;
00201   }
00202 
00203   while (!term.terminate()) {
00204     pd.recreate_vertices_memento( mMemento, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00205     pd.get_free_vertex_coordinates( w[QNVEC] );
00206 
00207     x = v[QNVEC];
00208     for (i = QNVEC; i--; ) {
00209       a[i] = r[i] * inner( &(w[i][0]), arrptr(x), nn );
00210       plus_eq_scaled( arrptr(x), -a[i], &v[i][0], nn );
00211     }
00212      
00213     solve( arrptr(d), arrptr(x) );
00214   
00215     for (i = QNVEC; i--; ) {
00216       b[i] = r[i] * inner( &(v[i][0]), arrptr(d), nn );
00217       plus_eq_scaled( arrptr(d), a[i]-b[i], &(w[i][0]), nn );
00218     }
00219     
00220     alpha = -inner( &(v[QNVEC][0]), arrptr(d), nn );  /* direction is negated */
00221     if (alpha > 0.0) {
00222       MSQ_SETERR(err)("No descent.", MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00223       return;
00224     }
00225    
00226     alpha *= sigma;
00227     beta = 1.0;
00228     
00229     pd.move_free_vertices_constrained( arrptr(d), nn, -beta, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00230     valid = func.evaluate( pd, objn, v[QNVEC], err ); 
00231     if (err.error_code() == err.BARRIER_VIOLATED)             
00232       err.clear();  // barrier violated does not represent an actual error here
00233     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00234     if (!valid ||
00235         (obj - objn < -alpha*beta - epsilon &&
00236          length( &(v[QNVEC][0]), nn ) >= tol1)) {
00237       
00238       if (!valid)  // function not defined at trial point
00239         beta *= beta0;
00240       else  // unacceptable iterate
00241         beta *= beta1;
00242       
00243       for (;;) {
00244         if (beta < tol1) {
00245           pd.set_to_vertices_memento( mMemento, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00246           MSQ_SETERR(err)("Newton step not good", MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR);
00247           return;
00248         }
00249       
00250         pd.set_free_vertices_constrained( mMemento, arrptr(d), nn, -beta, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00251         valid = func.evaluate( pd, objn, err );
00252         if (err.error_code() == err.BARRIER_VIOLATED)             
00253           err.clear();  // barrier violated does not represent an actual error here
00254         MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00255         if (!valid) // function undefined at trial point
00256           beta *= beta0;
00257         else if (obj - objn < -alpha*beta - epsilon) // unacceptlable iterate
00258           beta *= beta1;
00259         else
00260           break;
00261       }
00262     }
00263     
00264     for (i = 0; i < QNVEC-1; ++i) {
00265       r[i] = r[i+1];
00266       w[i].swap( w[i+1] );
00267       v[i].swap( v[i+1] );
00268     }
00269     w[QNVEC-1].swap( w[0] );
00270     v[QNVEC-1].swap( v[0] );
00271     
00272     func.update( pd, obj, v[QNVEC], mHess, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00273     norm_r = length_squared( &(v[QNVEC][0]), nn );
00274     //norm_g = sqrt(norm_r);
00275 
00276     // checks stopping criterion 
00277     term.accumulate_patch( pd, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00278     term.accumulate_inner( pd, objn, &v[QNVEC][0], err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00279   }
00280 }
